Package ru.golubev.openweathersdk

Class WeatherSdkConfigurer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.golubev.openweathersdk.WeatherSdkConfigurer
  • public final class WeatherSdkConfigurer
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration class for OpenWeather SDK client setup.

    Provides fluent API for configuring various aspects of the weather client including caching, HTTP behavior, localization, and update strategies.

    Example usage:

    
 WeatherSdkConfigurer config = new WeatherSdkConfigurer("api-key")
     .updateMode(UpdateMode.POLLING)
     .pollingInterval(Duration.ofMinutes(10))
     .language(SupportedLanguage.SPANISH)
     .units(Units.METRIC)
     .loggingEnabled(true)
     .cache(cacheCfg -> cacheCfg
         .ttl(Duration.ofMinutes(15))
         .maxSize(100))
     .http(httpCfg -> httpCfg
         .connectTimeout(Duration.ofSeconds(5))
         .readTimeout(Duration.ofSeconds(10)));
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    WeatherSdkConfigurer.UpdateMode, SupportedLanguage, Units

      • http

        public WeatherSdkConfigurer http​(java.util.function.Consumer<WeatherSdkConfigurer.HttpClientConfigurer> customizer)

        Parameters:
        customizer - consumer that modifies the HTTP client configuration
        Returns:
        this configurer instance for method chaining

        Example:

        
 .http(cfg -> cfg
     .connectTimeout(Duration.ofSeconds(3))
